doc.name: desktopChanged
doc.summary: Sent to the current card of the defaultStack whenever the geometry of the screen changes.

description.p: Handle the desktopChanged message to rearrange or reconfigure your layout when the user changes their screen size or layout.

As this message can be sent by the OS at any time, it is recommended that you handle the message in the main-stack of your application. The LiveCode IDE broadcasts the message to all main stacks that are currently open at the time the engine receives the notification from the OS - this is to improve consistency with behaviour in standalone applications.
